title: Textile, early 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk on silk
Technique: embroidery on grosgrain woven fabric
description: Fragment of dark brown silk grosgrain with bit of embroidery on one side. Part of large orange and yellow blossoms and green leaves. Triangular shape.
